content.html: Cuba is about to adopt the most progressive family law in the world. This goes far beyond gay marriage to recognizing the rights of families however they are organized based on love and equality. This should be a model for socialist movements everywhere en.granma.cu/cuba/2022-05-1…
content.value:
Cuba is about to adopt the most progressive family law in the world. This goes far beyond gay marriage to recognizing the rights of families however they are organized based on love and equality. This should be a model for socialist movements everywhere

en.granma.cu/cuba/2022-05-1…
